metadata.title: Corona Virus Disease 2019, a growing threat to children?
metadata.author: Pu Yang, Pin Liu, Dan Li, Dongchi Zhao

Most of children COVID-19 are familial clusters with mild clinical symptoms.
Isolation should be performed to protect underlying diseases children.
It is necessary to isolate the newborns immediately after delivery.
